Package com.twl.xg.dao

Class SensorRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twl.xg.dao.SensorRepository

  • @Repository
public class SensorRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    Persistence layer for sensor entity, defines basic operations in database.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Xiaozheng Guo
    See Also:
    SensorEntity

    • Method Detail

      • updateSensorName

        public boolean updateSensorName​(java.lang.String sensorIp,
                                java.lang.String sensorName)
        Update the name of a sensor.
        Parameters:
        sensorIp - IP of the sensor you want to update.
        sensorName - The name you want to update for the sensor.
        Returns:
        true for success, false otherwise.

      • get

        public SensorEntity get​(java.lang.String sensorIp)
        Get a SensorEntity instance for the input sensor IP. Return null if the input sensor IP doesn't exist in database.
        Parameters:
        sensorIp - The IPv6 address of the sensor you want to get.
        Returns:
        SensorEntity

      • size

        public long size​()
        Get the total number of entries of sensor.
        Returns:
        the size of sensor table.

      • save

        public java.lang.String save​(SensorEntity sensorEntity)
        Save the input sensorEntity in database. Throw a NullPointerException if the input sensorEntity is null.
        Parameters:
        sensorEntity - Instance of SensorEntity for the sensor you want to save.
        Returns:
        return a string of ID of the saved entry

      • clear

        public void clear​()
        Delete all entries in sensor table. Note: this operation will also delete all entries in sensorData table, because sensorData table is delete-cascade.

      • getAll

        public java.util.List<SensorEntity> getAll​()
        Fetch all entries in sensor table, ordered by sensor name.
        Returns:
        A list of SensorEntity.

      • getAllSensorIp

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllSensorIp​()
        Get all sensor IP from the database. If there is no sensor in the database, return an empty list.
        Returns:
        A list of String contains all sensor IP.

      • getAll

        public java.util.List<SensorEntity> getAll​(java.lang.String borderRouterIp)
        Fetch all entries of sensors that connected to the input border router. Return an empty list if the input borderRouterIp doesn't exist in database.
        Parameters:
        borderRouterIp - The IPv6 address of the border router to which the sensors are connected.
        Returns:
        A list of SensorEntity.
